subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets squandered a three-run lead in the eighth but tied the score again in the bottom of the inning, and Wilmer Flores delivered a game-ending single in the 10th.
snippet: The Mets squandered a three-run lead in the eighth but tied the score again in the bottom of the inning, and Wilmer Flores delivered a game-ending single in the 10th.
